Christs communion with his church militant First preached, and now published, for the good of Gods church in generall. By Nicholas Lockyer, Mr. of Arts. Lockyer, Nicholas, 1611-1685.
[20], 194 p.
Printed by E. G[riffin] for Iohn Rothwell, at the Sunne in S. Pauls Church-yard, London : 1640.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College (Dublin, Ireland). Library.
